headline: Citi’s Premium Card Rollout Was Marred by Errant Approvals
summary: The bank froze accounts after a special sign-up link intended for branch customers was posted online.

raw.headline: Citi’s Premium Card Rollout Was Marred by Errant Approvals

headline: Citigroup (C): Assessing Valuation After CFO Transition and Major Consumer Business Restructuring
summary: Citigroup (C) is in the spotlight this week after the company announced a transition in its Chief Financial Officer role, along with a major reorganization of its U.S. consumer business. These changes are drawing investor attention. See our latest analysis for Citigroup. All this comes as Citigroup’s momentum has quietly built over the past year, with a recent share price of $102.5 and a year-to-date share price return of 46.5%. Strategic moves such as its sweeping consumer business...

headline: Aramco selects Citigroup for oil storage terminals stake sale
summary: The move follows a competitive process involving several major investment banks, with Citigroup emerging as the preferred adviser in recent days.
